title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Feb 04 2020
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Feb 04 2020
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Mark Steyn guest hosts on Tuesday. Send American's Anchorman your well wishes by going to RushLimbaugh.com and clicking the "Special Notes for Rush" tab at the top left of the homepage. Rush shares his cancer diagnosis. This show will keep things normal. Admiring Rush’s performance. Joyless Dems can’t handle low-turnout Hawkeye Cauci. Even Putin couldn’t have pulled off what the Dems did in Iowa. DNC determined to shut out Crazy Bernie.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

You are Rush’s family and he loves you. How can Dems control the climate when they can’t run a caucus? As Schiff says Trump is trying to steal 2020 election, Dems steal the Iowa caucus. Hawkeye Cauci fiasco can’t be simple incompetence. Moderates are stealing elections from their own side. Is there anything more corrupt than releasing partial results? Bernie lacks Trump's killer instinct. Joe Biden came up poor fourth.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Mark Davis’ lovely piece about guest hosting for Rush. Impeachment has made Trump stronger. Hunter Biden isn’t a bright boy. Things go better when John Kerry and Joe Biden don’t campaign. Why won’t the media say Biden came up fourth? The so-called moderate Dems are left-wing like AOC and Crazy Bernie. Trump’s Bloomberg jokes. Pelosi is worried about Bernie and AOC. I owe everything to Rush.


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
